text: 21.44: Ais 8.14-15 naŋga, 60.12 naŋga, Dan 2.44-45 naŋga, Sek 12.3 naŋga, 1 Pi 2.8Kamata kru tɨmba hɨmba kandɨhañɨ mɨŋgata yɨvɨrɨmandɨ hama punzɨ haŋɨnɨŋ yɨvurɨvumbɨrɨmandɨ. Hara tɨmba kandɨha kru ŋgɨmba muyɨ mɨŋgata yɨvɨrɨmandɨ ha, tɨmba ha kru kandɨhamaŋ yɨvɨti mɨñɨndɨrɨmandɨ, vami.21.44 Kru indarɨmit avi naŋga muvɨra ambandu. Kuyu Matyu 21.44yɨ kɨndi nɨŋandɨhin Matyu mayɨhimbɨvɨrami. Sɨhɨndɨvu kru mumɨŋga yɨhimbɨvɨrami, vandu. Luk 20.18yɨ ŋgamara.
